content.rendered:
I’ve had a big stack of tabs open on both my mobile and laptop recently. I took time this morning to review them and add some of them to my pinboard. Rather than Tweet them all out, here’s a list of new stuff on my radar!

  • esbuild – An extremely fast JavaScript bundler –
  • Ecograder – Tool for analysing the ecoligical/carbon impact of websites
  • Navicat GUI | DB Admin Tool for MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MariaDB, SQL Server, Oracle & SQLite client – Complex database query tool
  • Quick Tip: Laravel Jetstream Banners | Laravel News – Tip on using notification/alert/infromational banners in Laravel Jetstream
  • How Many Plants – Indoor and House Plant Resource – Beautiful and comprehensive guide to houseplants
  • lukeraymonddowning/honey: A spam prevention package for Laravel, providing honeypot techniques, ip blocking and beautifully simple Recaptcha integration. Stop spam. Use Honey. –
  • mailgo – Cool JS library that’s and alternative to mailto and tel links for email addresses and telephone numbers
  • Jarrett Lerner – Amazing creative comic art drawing resources from this comic artist
  • There™ – Work across timezones efficiently & remotely – Simple app to see who is in which timezone and what time it is there.
  • Aldrumo – TALL Stack CMS
  • Pitch 一 Collaborative presentation software for modern teams. –
  • Zsh Tricks to Blow your Mind –
  • Iconic — Free “do wtf you want with” pixel-perfect icons – Super completely free SVG icons
  • 6 Things I Do to Make Gutenberg Development Easier – Jem – UK blogger – Good list of tips for developing with Gutenberg/Block Editor
  • Setting up a new local WordPress install – Example bash script for setting up a WordPress install
  • Martin Heinz | Deep Dive into Docker Internals - Union Filesystem – Explainer of Docker’s filesystems

excerpt.rendered: A bunch of links I’ve added to my pinboard including tech, WordPress, Laravel, family, and creativity.
